page.title: 15Beechenlea Nursery:Swanley
page.content: We went to visit Beechenlea Nursery, the lady there was very kind and said that the gentleman we were going to see knew everything about the nursery,as he had been there 51 years.He told us that e grew 1 million bedding plants, chrysanthemums,and tomatoes every year and has 15 greenhouses.He let us go into the greenhouses,they were very hot. The produce is sold to the public at Sevenoaks market,but this year has not been a good one for the crops.The nurseryman had a dog called Patty. It was so hot that they gave us a drink before we got into the car.
